subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[glorious]] (as the [[sun]])
# [[daylight]], [[sunlight]]
# [[one]] of the [[seven]] so-called [[planet]]s of [[pre-]][[modern]] [[astronomy]] (the sun, the [[moon]], [[Mercury]], [[Venus]], [[Mars]], [[Jupiter]] and [[Saturn]])

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|七曜|九曜|乾曜|五曜|兩曜|吐曜|土曜|惡曜|日曜|日曜日|星曜|晞曜|普曜經|曜日|曜靈|月曜|月曜日|木曜|木曜日|水曜|水曜日|火曜|火曜日|炳曜|眩曜|金曜|震曜|黑曜岩}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: Used for the days of the week, for example {{m|ja|日曜|tr=nichiyō}} or {{m|ja|日曜日|tr=nichiyōbi||[[Sunday]]}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
